name: Rage Recorder
description:
Are you the kind of person who likes to suffer?

Are you the kind of person who challenges the most difficult content and feels the chills when they succeed?

Well, this is the game made for people like you.

----- Instructions-----

The game is simple, You have a level which has elements that move forward.

You can collect items that will effect these elements. For example: Collect a "Rewind", and these elements will rewind. Collect a "fast forward", suddenly everything starts moving faster.

Stuck in an awkward place? No worries, press "R" to reset the level.

Also did I forget to mention that this is a platformer **Cough "Precision platformer" Cough**?  Yes! U have to move and jump around to reach the end point and move on to the next level.

(Note: Play in full screen and full HD resolution for the best experience)

----------------------------

Made by "That Indie Dude"
